name: Cerberus (RadRize, Scholar.Of.Doom, ivanrecioo)
description:
Figth cerberus in an epic battle! You died and you are trying to scape the underworld but cerberus is guarding the exit, kill it if you can and scape or perish and be trapped in the underworld forever. 

*The browser version has occasional framedrops* Feel free to dowload the game

Controlls:

Movement: WASD

Attack: Click

Roll: shift
